attributes.action: abolish hospital staff car parking charges in the England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: here in Plymouth derriford Hospital Staff parking charges are about to rise from 50p a day to £1.20. I am sure similar charges are being made at other hospitals. Other parts of the UK do not have to pay is this just. STOP this charge now

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
